become-seller-banner-two-text: It's time to start making money.
how-it-works-caption: You can easily start selling online on Endiks in 4 simple steps
step-four-title: Send each order to the shipment address
step-one-first-point: Registration is only valid for invited sellers. If you are interested, you can
step-two-first-point: Start adding products you want to sell, condition of the product(s), list products attributes - e.g title, description
step-three-first-point: Once the order is placed, the funds will be deposited into your Alipay or WeChat account. Each order must be sent separately.
step-four-first-point: When a customer places an order, Endiks will notify you. Each order must be sent separately to the shipping address provided in the order dashboard
step-one-second-point: After the invitation, you can register and create a seller profile.
step-two-second-point: You can add products to the Endiks Marketplace catalog at once
step-three-second-point: After sending the order, Endiks will release the funds to your Alipay or WeChat account and notify you when the payment is completed
step-four-second-point: Note that even if the shipping address is the same, the order must be sent separately. Violation of this rule may result in the seller being suspended.
why-sell-caption: When you use Endiks for sales, your products are found
why-sell-one-first: Endiks will not charge you any commission, but we will add an 11% profit margin on top of each product so that users can see prices that are different from the prices you allocate
why-sell-two-first: Our tools and services make it easy for you to manage, promote and grow your business.
why-sell-three-first: Endiks is there to help you do the heavy lifting for your business and attract millions of customers.
verify-success: Your email has been successfully verified
